titles.title: A resolution designating the week of May 18 through May 24, 2014, as "National Public Works Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
5/22/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the week of May 18-May 24, 2014, as National Public Works Week.
Recognizes the important contributions of public works professionals to improving U.S. public infrastructure and to the communities they serve.
